data.message: You hold em... You and ya drawers are no better than me or mine. Kids once looked up to those of morals & values. Now the globalists call the shots while the "famous" bow to & beg acknowledgement to them. Sounds like servitude & oppression to me-for damned sure no hero. Courage is not found in the herd, get off your knees & defy the narrative of deception. The famed could Easily be heroes & unify us all. The power would energize our galaxy unseen by our species! Ponder That Marshall...peace.
